name: Beautiful user interface
description: A fast and modern user interface your users will love. Based on Twitter's Bootstrap Design trend.

name: Collaboration & Alerts
description: Follow what interests you, get automatic alerts and collaborate on documents easily.

name: Easy setup
description: Simplified initial setup with a configuration progress bar (example: set your initial balances from one screen).

name: Reduce data entry
description: No need to create invoices manually, print and send them, register bank statements, follow-up payments... Automate more, save time.

name: Pay Multiple Invoices
description: Ability to reconcile a payment with several invoices using a button on the payment form.

name: Mobile
description: Get an instant access to all accounting features, wherever you are, on tablets or smart phones.

name: Clean customer invoices
description: Olam invoices are easy to create, beautiful and full featured. (payment terms, multiple taxes, discounts, price lists)

name: Draft invoice propositions
description: Draft invoices are created automatically by Olam based on sales order, timesheets or delivery orders.

name: Advanced Payment terms
description: Support multiple payments for one invoice, cash discounts, advance invoice and partial reconciliations.

name: On-the-fly payment reconciliation
description: When creating an invoice, Olam suggests outstanding payments automatically so that you don't have to reconcile it later.

name: Credit Card/Mobile Money Payments
description: Get paid quickly by supporting online payment with credit cards. We support main payment gateways like Paypal, M-Pesa, etc.

name: Aged receivable balance
description: The receivable report gives you a clear overview of overdue payments and treasury forecast.

name: Customer Portal
description: Your customer can track their order status, invoices, and payments through their portal.

name: Advanced customer statements
description: Get clear reports on customer statements and navigate easily through the documents to understand every customer use case.

name: QR Codes
description: Your customers can scan a QR code with their banking app to pay. The QR code is on PDF invoices and shows up in the payment screen of quotations and invoices.
